sentence.Network_en: Local residents saw it plunge towards Earth with a deafening roar.
sentence.Network_cn: 当地的居民看见它伴着一声震耳欲聋的巨响撞向地面。

sentence.Network_en: When we ask people for suggestions we get a deafening silence.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我们向大家寻求建议时，得到的只是一片死寂的沉默。

sentence.Network_en: Four deafening explosions shattered the stillness of the night air.
sentence.Network_cn: 四起震耳欲聋的爆炸声打破了夜空的寂静。

jx.jx_en_mean: A silence or lack of response that reveals something significant, such as disapproval or a lack of enthusiasm.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 震耳欲聋的安静：透露某种重要的事的安静或不回答，例如不同意或缺乏热诚

entry.def: A deafening noise is a very loud noise.

example.ex: ...the deafening roar of fighter jets taking off.
example.tran: 喷气式战斗机起飞时震耳欲聋的轰鸣声

entry.tran: (沉默）没有任何回应的，死一般的
entry.def: If you say there was a deafening silence, you are emphasizing that there was no reaction or response to something that was said or done.

example.ex: When we ask people for suggestions we get a deafening silence.
example.tran: 当我们向大家寻求建议时，得到的只是一片死寂的沉默。

means.word_mean: 1. loud enough to cause (temporary) hearing loss

auth_sentence.content: The silence of local politicians generally has been deafening.
auth_sentence.res_content: The silence of local politicians generally has been deafening.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The silence of local politicians generally has been deafening.

auth_sentence.content: The silence from Congress politicians was deafening.
auth_sentence.res_content: The silence from Congress politicians was deafening.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The silence from Congress politicians was deafening.

auth_sentence.content: He continued tending to his frogs, with their deafening chorus.
auth_sentence.res_content: He continued tending to his frogs, with their deafening chorus.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He continued tending to his frogs, with their deafening chorus.

sentences.en: A deafening cheer went up from the crowd.
sentences.cn: 人群中爆发出震耳欲聋的欢呼声。

sentences.en: He hated the deafening noise of a jet plane.
sentences.cn: 他讨厌喷气式飞机震耳欲聋的噪音。

sentences.en: At that same instant,a deafening explosion set the windows rattling.
sentences.cn: 正在这时,一声震耳欲聋的爆炸突然袭来,把窗玻璃震得当当地响。

sentences.en: Tom had his radio on at full blast—it was deafening.
sentences.cn: 汤姆把收音机开得大大的—简直要把耳朵震聋了。
